changeSpeed.description: Change the playback speed of video files. Speed up or slow down videos while maintaining audio synchronization. Supports various speed multipliers and common video formats.
changeSpeed.title: Change Video Speed

compress.description: Compress videos by scaling them to different resolutions like 240p, 480p, 720p, etc. This tool helps reduce file size while maintaining acceptable quality. Supports common video formats like MP4, WebM, and OGG.
compress.shortDescription: Compress videos by scaling to different resolutions
compress.title: Compress Video

cropVideo.description: Crop video to remove unwanted areas.
cropVideo.errorBeyondHeight: Crop area extends beyond video height ({{height}}px)
cropVideo.errorBeyondWidth: Crop area extends beyond video width ({{width}}px)
cropVideo.errorCroppingVideo: Error cropping video. Please check parameters and video file.
cropVideo.errorNonNegativeCoordinates: X and Y coordinates must be non-negative
cropVideo.errorPositiveDimensions: Width and height must be positive
cropVideo.loadVideoForDimensions: Load a video to see dimensions
cropVideo.longDescription: This tool allows you to crop video files to remove unwanted areas or focus on specific parts of the video. Useful for removing black bars, adjusting aspect ratios, or focusing on important content. Supports various video formats including MP4, MOV, and AVI.
cropVideo.shortDescription: Crop video to remove unwanted areas
cropVideo.title: Crop Video

toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to crop video files to remove unwanted areas. You can specify the crop area by setting the X, Y coordinates and width, height dimensions.
toolInfo.title: Crop Video

flip.description: Flip video files horizontally or vertically. Mirror videos for special effects or correct orientation issues.
flip.title: Flip Video

changeSpeed.description: Change the playback speed of GIF animations. Speed up or slow down GIFs while maintaining smooth animation.
changeSpeed.title: Change GIF Speed

loop.description: Create a looping video by repeating the original video multiple times.
loop.title: Loop Video

toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to create a looping video by repeating the original video multiple times. You can specify how many times the video should loop.
toolInfo.title: What is a {{title}}?

mergeVideo.description: Combine multiple video files into one continuous video.
mergeVideo.longDescription: This tool allows you to merge or append multiple video files into a single continuous video. Simply upload your video files, arrange them in the desired order, and merge them into one file for easy sharing or editing.
mergeVideo.title: Merge videos

rotate.description: Rotate video files by 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Correct video orientation or create special effects with precise rotation control.
rotate.title: Rotate Video

trim.description: Trim video files by specifying start and end times. Remove unwanted sections from the beginning or end of videos.
trim.shortDescription: Trim video by removing unwanted sections
trim.title: Trim Video

videoToGif.description: Convert video files to animated GIF format. Extract specific time ranges and create shareable animated images.
videoToGif.title: Video to GIF
